TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlElementErrorEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlElementErrorEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class HtmlElementErrorEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何取消显示脚本错误并显示你自己的自定义对话框。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress a script error and display your own custom dialog box. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序主机控件名为`webBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application host a control named `webBrowser1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow/CS/Form1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow/VB/Form1.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#451)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#451)]

summary.span: 获取或设置此错误是否已由承载文档的应用程序处理。

span.span: Gets or sets whether this error has been handled by the application hosting the document.

value.span: 如果事件已被处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the event has been handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`如果你想要自己的自定义错误消息显示给用户，或完全禁止显示错误。Set this property to `true` if you wish to display your own custom error message to the user, or suppress the error entirely. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何取消显示脚本错误并显示你自己的自定义对话框。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress a script error and display your own custom dialog box. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序主机控件名为`webBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application host a control named `webBrowser1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow/CS/Form1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow/VB/Form1.vb#16)]

public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

span.span: An designating the script line number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果托管 HTML 文档包含帧时，它可能不明显的框架负责生成错误。If you are hosting an HTML document that contains frames, it might not be evident which frame is responsible for generating the error. 使用此属性提供调试信息，以便开发人员可以更好地缩小问题。Use this property to provide debugging information so that a developer can better narrow down the problem. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
